name: Pong (itch) (CadaCreate)
description:
Let’s Play Pong!

This is project created by James Stephenson to display skills he has learned in Interactive Media.
This project was completed in January 2017 and is the first project made in regards to his FIEA Programming Portfolio.

Please see most recent projects made by James to get a better idea of how his skills have improved.

This was made using the SDL (Simple Direct Media Layer) framework. It was programmed using C/C++ (mostly C++).

This was built using Xcode 6 in the macOS.

To play the game run the project in the IDE, I currently am not familiar how to package the project for a release build so that anyone can run it on their systems. If I figure it out I will update this readme with instructions and a How To.
